attributes.action: Cancel and void the English Football Premiership 2019/20 season due to Covid19
attributes.additional_details: Due to the Coronavirus Covid19, it's effecting the safety and risk of the players, staff and supporters.  The health of our peers, individuals and future continuity of the sport is paramount. The season should be ended and voided.
attributes.background: Due to the Coronavirus Covid19, it's effecting the safety and risk of the players, staff and supporters. Therefore no further games should be played, as such, the season is officially unfinished voiding any potential winner of the league

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
